traits.name: Fatal Upkeep
traits.description: Debuffs deal {0} more damage against enemies.

traits.name: Fear Toxin
traits.description: '{Poison} on enemies with {Terror} does {Wild Damage} and deals [1] extra damage for every {0} {Terror} stacks on the enemy.'

traits.name: Incubation
traits.description: '{Poison} no longer triggers at the start of turn. {Poison} damage is doubled. This applies to both allies and enemies.'

traits.name: Plague
traits.description: 'Whenever {Poison} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Poison} to all other enemies.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Polluted Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Earth} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Earth} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Poison} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Proliferate
traits.description: 'Whenever this monster applies a debuff: Deals a {3} {Earth}/{Water} damage [Hit] to the enemy.'

traits.name: Toxic Assault
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: Applies {1} {Poison}, then triggers {Poison}.'

traits.name: Toxic Cycle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Poison} stacks applied to enemies: Applies {Regeneration} to each ally.'

traits.name: Toxic Earth
traits.description: '{On Earth Action from any ally}: Applies {Poison} to each enemy.'

traits.name: Toxic Shielding
traits.description: 'Whenever {Shield} is applied to an ally: Applies {Poison} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Poison}.'

traits.name: Assault Shield
traits.description: '{On Crit}: {Shields} the ally with the lowest amount of {Shield} for {1}.'

traits.name: Burning Mark
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} against enemies for every stack of {Burn} on them.

traits.name: Critical Aether
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Critical Hybridization
traits.description: '{On Crit}: Deals a {3} {Wild Damage} [Hit].'

traits.name: Critical Purging
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: {Purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Cruelty
traits.description: 'At the start of combat and whenever an enemy is staggered: Applies {1} {Force} to self.'

traits.name: Evasion Mastery
traits.description: '{Crit Chance} on allies also increases their {Evasion} by {0%} of that amount.'

traits.name: Hunt
traits.description: Allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance}.

traits.name: Sidecrits
traits.description: This monster’s {Sidekick} {Attack} is always {critical}.

traits.name: Sleight of Hand
traits.description: +{0} {Crit Damage}. Every {third} [Hit] of an {Action} is a {Critical Hit}. For multi-target {Actions}, it is every {second} hit against each enemy instead.

traits.name: Vigorous Edge
traits.description: Your allies gain +{0%} {Crit Chance} for every {Regeneration} stack on them. Each {Attack} consumes [1] {Regeneration}.

traits.name: Aethereal Regeneration
traits.description: 'For every {0} consumed {Regeneration} stacks: Generates {1} {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Beacon
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed by an ally: Consumes a {Burn} stack on a random enemy to apply another {Regeneration} stack to the ally.'

traits.name: First Aid
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is applied to an ally: Heals them for {1}.'

traits.name: Instant Regeneration
traits.description: '{On Action from any ally}: Triggers {Regeneration} on them.'

traits.name: Leeching Bond
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed on this monster: Deals a {3} {Water} damage hit to all enemies with {Weakness}.'

traits.name: Long-Lived
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} stacks are applied to an ally: Applies an additional stack. The healing of {Regeneration} stacks is reduced by {0}.'

traits.name: Regenerated Prime
traits.description: 'When {Regeneration} triggers on an ally with full health: Applies {Power} to them.'

traits.name: Regenerating Water
traits.description: '{On Water Action from any ally}: Applies {Regeneration} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Regeneration}.'

traits.name: Regeneration Shield
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} triggers on an ally: {Shields} them for {1}.'

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is consumed by an ally: Cleanses {0} debuff stacks from them and applies them to random enemies.'

types.name: TypeBurn
types.description: This Type focuses on Burn stacks, which deal increasing damage to enemies whenever they try to use Aether.

types.name: TypeCritical
types.description: This Type focuses on dealing Critical hits. Great at dealing damage and breaking Poise.

types.name: TypePoison
types.description: This Type focuses on Poison stacks, which deal constant damage to enemies each turn.
